Articles.Content:
Hi,

I reinstalled KSP last week and since then my leftover science from previous missions is lost when i complete a new mission (career mode, plain vanilla). It seems to happen only when I recover my vessel with the orbitalstation. If it is possible to recover the vessel "on screen" (for example near the starting ground), everything is fine. 

Anybody got a solution for this problem?

Thanks!

This seems to happen to me as well.  If I recover (at splash down) a vehicle from a mission, the science that the vehicle returned is now all the science I have.  Doesn't matter what was sitting there before could be 12 or 1200 - it's all gone.

If I am transmitting science - from say one of the DMagic satellite parts - all transmitted science seems to be added in.  The glitch only happens when I recover a landed vehicle.
